content.detailedDescription:
Was riding in front passenger seat taking pictures of the scenery as it blurred by and looked up and took notice of two jets at about 40-50,000 feet. i noticed they were flying rather erradically. then i saw a third object emerge - this one had no vapor trail. i thought maybe it was a glider. i snapped a few photos of the flyover (see pic). but the image that i got doesn't show the 3rd object. these planes were out of formation. they appeared as though they were in pursuit of something. the third object went out of my sight as it went straight up 12 o'clock high in the sky, and my vantage became obscured by the roof of the car. oh, i should mention that my passenger side window is electric and the motor has been broken for some time. so i took a few shots through the front windshield, but both shots came away with nothinhg but blue sky.

it suer looked kinda scary though, seeing the 3rd object come out of nowhere - with no vapor trail...
content.summary: 2 fighter jets w/ vapor trails escorting 1 ufo with no vapor trail

content.detailedDescription: I was taking the trash out and i noticed what a beautiful clear evening it was, and how brightly the stars shown. as i put the trash down, i glanced up and noticed this boomerang shaped object (almost like a winged shape) gliding quietly along and was oddly glowing (a very light blue hue). i looked down for a second until i grasped what i saw. i just stood there thinking how i needed a camera. it was cruising along at a very slow pace, maybe 100-200 mph. not fast at all. when it went behind a cluster of trees about 5 seconds later, i tried to run to the other street, but it was gone. this is the first time i have ever seen anything like this. i've always been skeptical, but this has definitely changed my mind. don't be surprised if i keep my head looking towards the heavens more often.
content.summary: Illuminating and gliding across the sky about 1200 ft up and 1000 ft away

content.detailedDescription: Myself, my sister, her husband, and their kids were cooking out. i was watching the sky as i always do (i saw a ufo when i was a kid so i always watch the skys) and i spotted a light, it was blinking on and off and seemed very high in the sky. it was cloudy but the sky was visible between clouds. i asked my sister if she could see it, at first she said no, the clouds were moving pretty fast, then she said "yes, it's a plane." i told her that it wasn't moving, that it was the clouds moving. after a minute she realized this was true. still she said it was probably a satelite. i asked why a satelite would be blinking, she said the sun was probably hitting it as it spun. i don't think it was a satelite, i would think satelites would move across the sky, not be stationary. the light was bright and blinked on and off. it never moved from its spot. except for the clouds, it was a sunny day. planes passed through the sky, some below the clouds and a few i saw passed above the clouds, i saw them through the open spaces in the clouds, they all seemed way lower than the thing i was looking at. after about ten minutes it was too cloudy to see the sky and i gave up, about thirty minutes later the sky cleared and the object was gone. this morning (3/15/10) i drove to the store and baught a pair of binoculars, i watched the sky all day, espesially from 5:00 to 6:00 pm, it was a clear day, didn't see any satelite, i will do this all week.
content.summary: Saw  an unmoving blinking light far up in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
At around 8 p.M i went to the grocery store about 2 miles from my house. spent about fifteen minutes inside. it was dark. as i'm walking to my car in the parking lot, facing west is a group of 3 mountains. greenlee, hoover and mackeys mtn. directly above mackey is a very bright object. 

i stop and look and rush to my car. the shopping center is attached to a lowes hardware. lowes is in a large field that borders a large shrub farm. i drive to lowes parking lot and roll down my window, facing west. the object appears to be white with hues of blue emanating at times. mackey mountain is about 3 miles away, as the crow flies. i watch the object for a few minutes and decide it might be overhead at my house, because you can see mackey from my front porch. i call my dad on my cell phone and tell him to go outside and see if sees anything. i keep my eyes on the object until i start getting closer to mackey and realize it must have been behind the mountain instead of over top of it. which would make it much larger than i originally thought. i turn back around and go back to lowes but it is gone. my father didn't see anything.

this is not the first experience ive had. had a very intense experience in '05. i came home to check if anyone posted sightings in nc and someone had posted one today in wilmington. thats the east coast of the state and i'm at the western part of the state. perhaps the two are related.
content.summary: Very bright, color changing sphere

content.detailedDescription: Just happened to look out my south bathroom window right above my house around 11:15 pm and saw about a dozen really bright and large stars, or so i thought at first (i had to have opened my shade for some reason, as we keep that closed after dark). i then looked to the east and they were across the road above a field, but not above my bathroom window. i didn't notice a movement. they were in one place and then in another, just like magic. the oval shaped bright objects just hovered, and they would grow dim and then grow bright again. they really just looked like overly-large bright stars, sort of oval. usually you see small stars with a large one here and there, but these were all more or less the same size, which struck me funny. they just disappeared. it was slightly cloudy that night of 3/11/10, thursday, which may have accounted for the brightness changing. i told my husband, when i went back to bed, that i saw some ufos. didn't think any more about it until i heard the report on nbc about the lake erie incident.
content.summary: Two location switches, one slightly south above my house and one south east over a field across the road, at first thought they were stars, but too large and same size~. moved in blink of an eye. faded in and out.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from my parent's house at approx. 9:35 pm est. i noticed a blue light in the sky moving that caught my attention. the light was not just moving forward, but also backwards and changing elevation. every 5 seconds or so it would change colors. the colors i noticed were red, blue, and green. i pulled over and got a very poor quality video of it on my blackberry. the object itself however was very vivid to my naked eye, but didn't translate well on my phone. after about 2 minutes, the object seemed to just vanish into thin air. i have been waiting for a very long time to see something like this, and this just confirms my suspicion of alien life. i think it's great what you guys at mufon are doing, and just thought i needed to tell you my story. please let me know if you have had any reports of objects like this recently, especially in the southeastern part of nc.

http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=_wkxgqcb2_q

sincerely,
james
content.summary: Changing lights in the sky rapidly moving

content.detailedDescription: Me and my son were out playing catch about 5pm and for some reason i looked up and seen this thing up in the sky at first i thought i was a balloon but after seiing it for a while i realized that it couldnt be a balloon it just sat there suspended up in the sky without moving it seemed to change shape at times after a while it started moving south real slow then faster and faster until i lost sight of it.
content.shape: Circle,   Cylinder,   Disc,   Sphere,   Square,   Rectagular
content.summary: I was playing catch with son and this object

content.detailedDescription: This is the 3rd time i have seen this triangle shape in the sky in south east direction? i noticed it a few weeks ago and i reported it and logged it the 2nd and 3rd time, the 1st time i could not belive my eyes but now i am sure it is a u.F.O it moves in all types of direction in very fast and sudden movements it has lights that are red, yellow, green, blue and white it appears to be very big atleast the size of two foot ball fields, if you were traveling east on route 27 toward augusta and looked to the left you can notice a very bright light and triangular shape that moves very sudden and fast but alos has the ability to hover in a area for very long periods of time it is usually near the big dipper in the sky but much brighter with radiant lights that strobe...
content.summary: 3rd time i have seen this triangle shape in the sky in south east direction?

content.detailedDescription: Went outside between 8:20 to 8:30 to move the garbage to the curb for monday morning pick up and looked up in the sky and seen bright light coming from the west low on the horizon, ran into the house and grabbed my 50 power binoculars and ran back outside. the object was moving slow enough for me to observe in the binos for over a min. plus the 30 sec it took to get the binos. i could see 2 lights when i looked through the binos. one on top was bright white in color the other was yelow white with red glow below and to the left of the white light. to the naked eye it appeared as one light, but with the binos there were 2 different lights. moved slowly to the east low on the horizon and disapeard, thought it was space station at first, but when i looked through the binos and saw 2 lights. i dont know what it was. the bottom light that was yellow and red center had more of a bowl shape on its side.  very strange sighting. would like to know what it was.
content.summary: Bright light south of my location  traveling from west to east

content.detailedDescription:
my wife, and i live near the intracoastal waterway in west palm beach, fl.  last night around 11:30pm i was taking our two small dogs for a walk down along the waterfront on flagler drive.  it was a clear night, with very few clouds, and about 65 degrees.  i was about a block south when the sound of a large jet starting booming in the sky, seemingly a little northwest of our location.  i didn't really think anything of it as jets take off & land at palm beach international airport, toward the direction of the sound.  you usually start hearing the sound change, like the doppler effect, as they either land from the east, or take off into the east.  occasionally you could see a the small, slow moving lights of a smaller plane.  after a couple minutes i realized the loud jet sound was not changing or decreasing.  it seemed so close, though there was nothing to see in the sky, even though it was very loud.  even one of our little dogs started getting frightened & started pulling back toward the house.  he had never reacted like this.  the propulsion sound was loud enough to be similar to what you would hear standing near a jet on the runway, maybe a hundred yards away ... definitely under a fair amount of throttle & not idling.  the best thing i could think of was that there was something hovering with a very powerful engine, or propulsion system, with little or no movement in one direction, or another.  but it didn't have that extra whine that you hear from the induction blades, that normally sound like a whistle.

i really knew this was not normal, and though i've never seen a ufo, nor have ever had desire of wanting to take a ride on one ... the experience was giving me that sense of unexplainable uneasiness.  i really felt i needed to get back to my wife.  by the time i got back home she was already on the front lawn, and had timed the sound as already having lasted about 8 minutes at that high level of volume.  it actually was loud enough to get her out of bed.  she got changed quickly so we could head off in the truck to hunt down the location of the sound.  the odd thing that we started to realize was that there was no one else alarmed by the sound on our street, like only we could hear it.  as we headed north we did see one group of kids outside by their truck, stopped in the middle of a side street.  we thought of stopping, but wanted to keep moving.  we could not believe how few people it had alarmed, as though whatever it was was only audible to certain individuals.  that was at least our initial thought, as it was also evident that only certain younger kids could hear it, apart from us.  as we got to southern boulevard, which is a main route to the airport, we kept the windows down to keep tracking the sound.  sometimes it seemed to be all around us, but then it would re-concentrate to the west.  we then pulled up along side a jeep cherokee with the front windows rolled down, heading in the same westward direction ... with two younger guys in it.  we asked if they heard the same sound, just so we could be sure there was "someone" else out there who heard this.  they said they were trying to track down the sound, as well.  they took off in front of us, as we both continued toward the airport.  just as we were cresting the i-95 overpass, which gives you a direct view of the airport, the sound stopped.  no planes were taking off, and there were no odd lights in the sky.  we got onto the road just to the east of the runways, but at that time my wife started feeling car sick, which she never does ... and said she really felt she did not want to enter the proper airport grounds.  we got home about 12:30pm, and kept trying to listen for it to start up again, to no avail.  however, our other little dog got quite nervous & started pacing around and looked up at the ceiling a few times.  he did not want to come back in the room.

all day today we scanned the local news & i typed different criteria into google like "loud noise, west palm beach,"  ufo, west palm beach," etc. .... for any news of the noise, or any strange news, but there was nothing.  it's really been quite disturbing & unnerving, especially as there is no one who's called us to say they had a similar experience.

thanks for letting me submit this.

regards,
barry
content.summary: Very loud jet propulsion sound over west palm that continued for at least 35 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: Ive already spoke with an investigator who has canceled my file . i was unable to get in touch with her do to having a baby . just want to say i believe your organization doesn't do what is needed to get the information you desire as ufo investigators. i deal with these visitors all my life and for your representative to cancel our meetings because i wouldn't hurry up is ludicrous. i could show you things you only see in pictures from time to time. i see them every day. i will not respond to any of you after this. i dont need to convince you of anything. i live it . if you want to learn something see things for yourself heres your opportunity. i will not extend my hand again.
content.summary: They have been outside both my homes for it least 4.5 months.

content.detailedDescription:
Basically just wanting to mention that i and several others have seen lights in or around the fox river area of waukesha (se wisconsin) on an off since last april, including a sighting at around 3:00am by myself and my husband.  the most recent of these sightings have been in the past week or two.

these are basically lights in a circular shape that appear significantly lower in the visual horizon than the "stars of the night sky".  they are also larger in size (about x5 to x10) than a bright star on a clear night (visual perspective).

they appear either instantaneously or "fade" into view.  usually they appear as a single instance, though on one occasion two were witnessed in close proximity to one another.  for the most part they simply seem to hoover - though their light seems to pulse and change color (mostly orange-ish).

however, eventually the do move - and the movement is barely perceptible - but quite odd - the seem to move in a up and down or side to side pattern. and in the case of the two being sighted together, one of the "balls of light" seemed to "zip off" directly to the east (right) of its hoovering counterpart at an extreme speed. for the most part they seem to move off quite slowly (fade from view) or simply "blink out" instantaneously (disappear)

we've tried to capture photos, but lack the appropriate equipment (our cellphones is about it for cameras).  we've also talked to quite a few people in the vicinity of the park and river who've also noticed these orbs or spheres recently too.

i think the thing that causes a person to notice them is that they are so much larger and lower than the stars, and their strange behavior/movements and color shifting.

(2 comments - 1 - this form is way too cumbersome.  get someone in your group who has familiarity with designing ui or hi to make the form much more user friendly and you'll probably get a lot more reporting.

2 - allow a default form set to be defined for anonymous posters.  some ppl will be glad to report such phenomena provided they can automatically do so with ease and without fear of public ridicule.  when we saw the first occurrence last year, i looked up "where to post ufo sightings" and found your site.  however, one look at your form and i opted not to.)

the only reason i am taking the time to make this report now, is these "spheres" or "orbs" myself and a number of my neighbors are seeing in the waukesha wisconsin area are strikingly familiar to those currently being seen/looked into near lake erie.  i'm sure there are a number of ppl in the area who could substantiate similar sightings (i've talked to at least 20 dif ppl who have seen these things), but they'd probably only do so if they were assured their names would be omitted and they'd not be "on camera" in any way.

though i remain largely skeptical on the topic of ufo's as a whole, these are definitely odd occurrences and they are reoccurring. though to be honest, i don't have the time to be camped out looking at the night sky all the time, so how often or if there's any pattern to their appearances i couldn't tell you.  i know they seem to be showing up a great deal the past week or so.
content.summary: Roundish orb or sphere

content.detailedDescription: I went into our back yard and glanced up and saw a slow moving white object.  i went back in the house and got my camera and a pair of binoculars.  the object was still there when i came back and it was moving slowly in a ne direction.  i figured it was a weather balloon, but decided to watch it anyway.  the sphere, or circle was white and had a glow. it moved slowly for another minute and then...Stopped. the sphere remained stopped for about 15 minutes in the same spot, so i had plenty of time to get photos with my digital camera(i realized it could not be a balloon since the wind would have moved it along). the object was a few miles away so the shots were taken by using the zoom on my camera. there was no sound and the sphere appeared to be about 8,000 feet up. the object then moved slowly going south and out of distance.
content.summary: White sphere

content.detailedDescription:
While photographing the chemtrails being sprayed over utrecht from my balcony, i caught sight and photos of what seemed like a small disk quickly going across the sky. it had no trail, was out of view within 10-15 seconds and made no noise that i could hear. it seemed very high up as can be seen in the videos and photos below.

i only noticed the object because i was photographing that area of the sky, at first i thought it was a weather balloon, but it was moving very quickly. i felt as if it seemed strange, but would probably be identifiable when i looked at the photos subsequently.

---
photo series: http://www.Youtube.Com/watch?V=c5ibyf04p0k note plane going by at 1:21 leaves only a brief trail, but then at 2:28 another plane goes by at what seems to be the same distance and altitude, leaving a thick trail that stays. another plane starts at 3:20 in the opposite direction, laying down another cross in the air that flattens out and seems to stick together.

at 2:36, something wizes by going north to south - looks like a disk or weather balloon at very high speed. i could not identify it.

the original still photos are available here http://goo.Gl/29fi
higher resolution ones of the ufo here http://goo.Gl/rrio
content.summary: Chemtrails and ufo over utrecht

content.detailedDescription:
Driving back from las vegas to twin falls, id. i stopped to don warmer clothing before going through hiko, nv and continuing north on hwy 318.

while changing clothes, i saw 5 orb type light appear west of hwy 93. i watched while changing and then continuing on my journey.  suddenly, the outer two light, shot away, one north and one south. the speed they took of at was impossible for aircraft i had seen. they stayed visible until total darkness and then about 10 to 20 later, then they just flashed off.


a few years later, i picked my stepdaughter from work and was almost home when i saw the lights again, over laveen, az. e watched them for almost 30 minutes
content.summary: 5 lights over the mountains.

content.detailedDescription: At around 1-1:30 am this which can be described as a space cutter appeared while we were on break outside of lil'chef in brighton mich.It created a trail of energy behind it and moved through this triangle in a particular flight path,5 other people seen this event.
content.summary: Space cutter type of craft that created triangle and moved through it!

content.detailedDescription:
Last tuesday, at approximately 3:50 pm in lakeway, tx (30���22'24" n, 97���58'37" w) i was leaving my house to run up to the store. right as i was opening my car door i had the urge to look up. i think the suns reflection off of the plane or the orb itself may have flashed and caught my peripheral. anyway i looked up and noticed a sw airline plane at 30��� ne heading west (roughly over lake travis). i noticed a bright white orb on its trail. the sky was completely clear and sunny out. i had to take my sunglasses off to make sure what i was seeing was not a reflection. not less than 30 seconds later, the orb slowed to almost a complete stop and veered 5��� ne as the plane continued its heading. as the orb came out of its turn, another orb came out of nowhere (possibly from the right of just appeared). the 2 orbs then proceeded to converge toward each other stopping at what appeared to be a side by side flight formation. they continued on heading north while climbing altitude until they slowly vanished. (the attached photo is a sketch of the incident i drew right after it happened. it has 2 time points (a & b) for reference)

side note: i am college educated and have been an avid sky watcher for many years, frequently viewing and photographing planes and helicopters. i have never seen anything like this and definitely had chills running up my spine after the incident had passed.  

also - i am not sure if this is related but later that evening there were helicopters circling the area. there was nothing crime or medically related that i could find on the news the next day and have never seen that many helicopter circling and patrolling the area.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Saw an orb following a sw airliner. it slowed down and veered right another orb appeared and they flew away together as if in formation.

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 2030 hrs mst, i took my dog out for his evening walk. as i walked into parking lot of my apartment building, i looked into the sky as i do every night. i noticed a bright light in the sky moving due east. i watched this bright light for about 5 minutes as it moved over the bridger mountains between bozeman and livingston montana. while i was watching it, i was comparing it to a plane in the sky flying nw. the plane was flying faster and at a higher altitude than the light. the light was flying very slowly and did not have any of the standard marking lights that airliners have. (ie. red and blue wing lights and the blinking belly light) after about five minutes or so, it then faded out. i didn't see it for the rest of the walk. when i came back inside i checked nasa's site to see where the iss was in comparison to my location. it was between south america and africa at the time. i should also mention that the light was flying at a higher altitude than a japanese flying lantern can get and the light was flying slower than a meteor. i called my mother so she could witness the event but the light faded before she had a chance to get to an east facing window. i was happy to have seen this event and hope to see another in the future.
content.summary: Bright light in sky then fades

content.detailedDescription:
Standing on back porch smoking after dinner cigar, looked due south saw an
object 1.5-2.0 miles away, must've been pretty large, rough triangular shape
 cruising due eastward at least mach 1 approx.1/4 mile distance suddenly
turned north, no gradual arc, perfect l, and disappeared. 
no aircraft moving at that speed can do that. object had an amber colored
light at outward edges, steady-running, and 1 flashing at rear apex between
middle?!Dark tonite, slightly overcast, lights were how i was able to make out shape of object. this thing just 90*d w/no stoppping or slowing due 
north and visibly disappeared as if the lights on it were extinguished.
dropped cigar on self burnt hand running in here to file report.
content.summary: Object appeared traversed straight line speeds excess800mph disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
I was out walking my dogs around my apartment complex at 6:50 am.  the sun was out, and the sky was a clear light blue.  

on our way back to the apartment, i noticed something in the southeastern sky, approximately 60 degrees above the horizon.  i do not know how far the object was, or its approximate size.  

it was a dark-colored, diamond-like object. i thought it was a small kite, because it glided around very slowly. i remember thinking, how strange that someone would fly a kite first thing in the morning, but it had no attached string.   as it hovered around very slowly, its right half reflected the sun's light.  i realized that the object was metal, and that's when i started to get really curious about what i was looking at.  i studied it for a little while longer to 1) run though the list of things it could be 2) commit the experience to memory so i could later describe it.  i watched it for maybe 3-4 minutes, until it started to fade into the distance towards the southeast.  i brought my dogs in before it completely disappeared and promptly went onto our porch (which faces due south) but saw nothing.

i do not know what it was, except that: 1) it was not a bird, for there were no wings.  2) it was not an airplane; no airplane i know of can hover at such low speeds. 3) it was not a hand-glider.  there were no visible people hanging from, or riding the object. 4) i know helicopters can hover, but this object had no turning blades.  5) it had no lights, and it wasn't zipping around at high speeds like ufos in sci-fi movies.  6) i do not know much about weather balloons, but i thought weather ballons traveled up. 7) there was not enough wind speed to carry a metallic object without a motor into the sky.
content.summary: Kite-like metallic object

content.detailedDescription:
It was more or less 9 pm. i was on the computer at my home on the suburbs of ponta delgada in the island of s���o miguel (azores).

my mother went to open the door of our house when she noticed a strong light over a mount some miles away. immediatly she called me and i went to see it.

at first i thought it was an emergency flash light but then it started moving in different directions until it disapeared during few seconds. then it appeared again for a little bit and then disappeared completely.

the object was kind of oval shape, very bright white light.
content.summary: Ufo appears over mountain in azores.
content.locationName: Ponta Delgada, Ilha de São Miguel

content.detailedDescription:
I captured two photos of the simple form ���������critter��������� recently. one on 5 march 2010 3 pm , another on 9 march 2010 3:17 pm. the last one was from two continuous pictures, the first photo shows a ufo in complex blurry shape, hanging above my roof ( seen the attached picture). the second photo shows a golden color dome shape object with a large black eye. half of it���������s body still hiding inside the pink cloak.  due to inconvenience, i cannot send it to you. that is the third times i captured the same kind image. 

please add this attached picture to case 18817 file (long term visitation). more details from: [cms/tg/pid]
content.summary: Pictures of two simple form critter

content.detailedDescription:
I was at the gardena, ca post office around 10:00am sunday, march 14 to send off a letter when i exited the building i looked up to see an airplane in the sky. i used to work at lax and have always had  a fascination with with flying aircraft.
i never thought that i would see something out of the ordinary until i saw bright objects flying around a central object that looked like a star. i had to confirm that i was seeing what this, i asked a person that was on his way into the post office to look up and confirm what i was seeing and he said that he did and asked how in the heck did you spot that?. i just told him to please tell me that you saw that and i'm not crazy.

i immediately drove home to tell my friends about the incident. i pointed to the star looking object. but there were no circulating orbs, they laughed at me and told me it was a star, but when that "star" suddenly disappeared they stopped laughing.
that is why i am writing you now.
content.summary: One bright central round stationary object/ with orbiting spheres

content.detailedDescription: Yo venia de un cumplea������os de mi sobrina que cumplio un a������o al llegar a mi domicilio mire hacia en frente y vimos por que hiba mi sobrino mi sobrina y mi cu������ada se������ale de frente la parabrisas varias luces volando a una velocidad no muy rapida pero fueron varias luces no una varias. volando hacia el sur de cuernavaca yo vivo en el centro de aqui vimos no vi vimos varias luces de color amarillo como si furan focos intensos volandoen orden en el espacio de aqui quede impresionado por lo que veia y varios de aqui vieron espero que tengan respuestas ojala puedan tener videos ya que mucha gente vio esto no eran cosas que algun ser humano alla visto esto pues ojala la gente alla captado en video lo que paso aqui este dia 13 de marzo del 2010 les pongo mi email telefono no si quieren que les diga de donde vi y preguntar con los vecinos que vieron yo les digo por donde pueden preguntar con las personas que vieron estos sucesos mas o menos le pongo un minuto ya que a lo mejor se tardo mas espero investiguen ya que a mi no me gusta las camaras ni entrevistas pero hay gente que les puede decir y mucha lo que vio este dia y no digan que son cohetes artificiales por que se desacritarian ustedes viendo lo lo que no vieron espero encuentren videos y fotos les deseo suerte y investigan y no pase lo de maussan con el caso que tuvieron dcian que son faltos de eso no se yo tampoco no meto las manos por lo que mostraron en television antes que nada les mando saludos desde aqui cuernavaca morelos 14 de marzo 2010
content.summary: Aparecen luces abaja altura mas o menos 200 metros

content.detailedDescription: It looked like a lot of smaller suns in the sky moving in sync with each other in a somewhat triangular pattern and there were 2 above those that were moving in sync with the ons below.
content.summary: Orange circular lights that look like smaller suns

content.detailedDescription:
On december 5th 2009 my family and i decided to attend a christmas parade in the city of jamestown, a small city located in western ny state about thirty miles south of lake erie.
  it was very cold that evening, so we decided to skip the parade and get dinner at a local restaurant instead..  while driving from the restaurant, i glanced into the sky, and noticed a round orange light, almost directly above the parade route.  at first i thought a news aircraft was filming the parade.  then i saw a second and then a third and a forth.  they were all the same size and shape, and upon further inspection, i decided they were too high up to be small air craft.  they were traveling from east to west, and moving very slow.  if i had to guise, i would say the objects were about one mile apart, and spaced at an even distance.  i thought maybe air craft, but most air craft you see, have flashing navigation lights.  these objects had none , just a solid orange light.  we had already ate dinner, and were on our way to drop off the kids at their grandmothers house to spend the night.  she lives on a hill above the city , so while my wife brought the kids into the house, i stood in her front lawn, and watched the lights.  two were gone, but two were still visible. the sky had no clouds that evening, and one of the lights seemed to diaper (go out) and then come back on.  in all i would say the whole event took 45 minutes to an hour.  too long in my opinion, to be jet air craft.  i never reported this event, until i saw a news report stating several people sited similar lights in the sky over lake erie, in cleveland ohio.  
  cleveland is about 130 miles west of jamestown.  i have never been a firm believer in the super natural or ufos. , but what i witnessed the night of december 5th, is definitely unidentified.
content.summary: Four orange slow moving lights in western ny sky

content.detailedDescription: Local mufon investigator told us to take her lead and that if we did that a ufo would come. we did what she asked not really expecting anything to happen. we played drums out side for about 3 hours. my wife was with us she went to bed and soon after a big ball of light came towards us fast i shot a laser beam directly at it then it just went back the way it had come. i never seen anything like it before and now i am more of a believer then i was before.
content.summary: Mufon investigator calls ufo and it comes

content.detailedDescription:
On a sunday of feb. 7th / 2010 just before a sunset , i felt compelled to look at the beautiful colorful sky & the very unusual 3 large swan-like white cloud formations , that particular window faces the south-west . as i was standing & wondering about these clouds i've noticed the white sphere-light moving below , (at this point i've decided this time i'll try to take a photo of it), first from the lower regular cloud & gliding in & up , than past above the 3 swan-like clouds . 
i have 5 sequenced photographs of the ufo lights . after taking these i stood there admiring it for , perhaps a minute or so , at least that's how long it felt as i did not look at my wrist watch . 
my digital camera registered the time though while taking & trying to zoom in on the subject , & the recorded time begun at exactly 4:46 pm to 4:49 pm .
after watching them for short while , the white sphere just disappeared :-(
through my observations on these flying objects , especially the last 12-18 months , they seem to have a preferred routes , lol ! 
 most times they fly in an exact line from the west to precise south of the usa , (i've checked on my sm. compass).  
btw , in the western sky that the ufos seem to fly from is where the toronto international airport is located , perhaps it is of some significance .
( also last year my friend noticed "lights" driving past the airport towards brampton & i've seen them again in the same flying pattern as usual & it is on his & another friend's insistence that i should start recording this 'phenomenon' in some form ).
  the 2nd "favourite" flyby route seems to be in a straight line from direct east towards exact south ! ( & always fly near or over the lake ) .
as a footnote , i did forwarded this info along with attached jpeg photos to mr. jim moroney at the aufosg on sat. march 6th / 2010.
p.S.  actually i am surprised at managing to 'capture' the ufo on my camera as it was some distance from where i reside & my camera is a simple kodak 10.3 mp with a 3x zoom only .

p.S.S.  on your media attachments i was only able to file 3 of the 5 photos that i've taken .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Beautiful sunset & a white orb surprise !
